title: 2 Bdrm/ 1 Bath At Skyline Heights Apartments
map_address: 960 Saint Francis Boulevard near Hickey blvd
posting_body: 960 Saint Francis Boulevard, Daly City, CA 94015
Upgrade your home and upgrade your life at Skyline Heights Apartments!
Ideally situated on beautifully maintained grounds in a lush, park-like setting, our luxury community offers Studio, One, and Two Bedroom apartment homes for rent in Daly City, California.
With easy access to the 280 and the Daly City BART Station, you can commute around the Bay Area with ease.
Resident portal with online rent payment available
Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $500 pet deposit per animal.
There is a weight limit of 35lbs per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.
